title: I got accepted into the PBE but the sign up isn't working.
body:
It tells me I got accepted into the cycle but every time I try to sign up to the PBE it tells me something went wrong. I'm not really sure how to upload an image of what this looks like but if anybody has any information it would be greatly appreciated.
Update: I tried to go onto the PBE sign up site with a VPN and now it just says that my application was just received but i haven't been accepted which is weird because it let me download the client for the PBE which it doesn't let you do until you've been accepted.

replies.body: The PBE site is down for maintenance, so players won't be able to access the page or apply right now.  We have a [status page ](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe)up as updates roll out.  Hang tight for now!
currently the signup pages are experiencing issue that riot are trying to fix, its not an error on your side but their. will have to wait patiently until its resolved.
